casebody.data:
Edward GOODMAN, Appellant
v.
PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee No. 33 EAP 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. January 23, 2019 Edward Goodman, AM-4974, SCI Mahanoy, 301 Morea Road, Frackville, PA 17932, Pro Se. Alan Matthew Robinson, John Craig Manning, Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole, Office of Chief Counsel, 1101 S. Front St., Ste. 5100, Harrisburg, PA 17104, for Appellee.

ORDER

PER CURIAM

AND NOW, this 23rd day of January 2019, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
